DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to reduce the incidence of postoperative constipation by systematic nurse assessment, interventions and evaluation, in the first month after thoracic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Prevention of Constipation: Systematic Nursing Interventions to Reduce Postoperative Constipation After Thoracic Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients admitted for planned lung surgery Patients are capable Able to talk and understand Danish Patients with colostomy and / or ileostomy Neurological or abdominal diseases Feed through a tube
